dmca.title: [ABUSE] Abuse Report -Illegal Activity]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, January 24, 2006 3:32 PM
To: rob@rudebox.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Abuse Report -Illegal Activity]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Abuse Report -Illegal Activity
Date:         Tue, 24 Jan 2006 12:45:00 -0700
From:         Rob <rob@rudebox.com>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



Dear Sirs,

There is a website which appears to be hosted on your servers called
passwordforum.com, that is dedicated to delivering pirated
username/passwords. This is an illegal activity under the US Digital
Millenium Copyright Act (D.M.C.A).

You can access one of their pages at the following url:
http://www.passwordforum.com/beta/

I am filing this formal complaint with you to request your assistance in
terminating this site, which is breaking laws and infringing on the
copyrights of our site and many others. Please respond asap to acknowledge.
Thank you.

Regards,
Rob Rude
RudeBox Media Inc.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.2 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFD1py9vK/XpJs6oyURAhQtAKCHK0Tj+44037/yLkKYrpZ2aZkIwACgoVEi
VK5EX4h3C7qLjHcA9NlCN7I=
=X6WW
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
